Package meka.gui.core

Class RecentFilesHandlerWithCommandline<M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • meka.gui.core.AbstractRecentItemsHandler<M,RecentFilesHandlerWithCommandline.Setup>
      • meka.gui.core.RecentFilesHandlerWithCommandline<M>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class RecentFilesHandlerWithCommandline<M>
extends AbstractRecentItemsHandler<M,RecentFilesHandlerWithCommandline.Setup>
    Recent files handler that stores a commandline alongside the file.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    fracpete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:

        public RecentFilesHandlerWithCommandline​(String propsFile,
                                         String propPrefix,
                                         int maxCount,
                                         M menu)
        Initializes the handler.
        Parameters:
        propsFile - the props file to store the files in
        propPrefix - the properties prefix, use null to ignore
        maxCount - the maximum number of files to keep in menu
        menu - the menu to add the recent files as subitems to

      • determineMinimumNumberOfParentDirs

        protected int determineMinimumNumberOfParentDirs​()
        Determines the minimum number of parent directories that need to be included in the filename to make the filenames in the menu distinguishable.
        Returns:
        the minimum number of parent directories, -1 means full path
